mapper.select: SELECT GUID, MASTERFK, DATASEQ, ITEMNAME, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM MA_LIFECYCLE_DETAIL
SELECT GUID, MASTERFK, DATASEQ, ITEMNAME, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID FROM MA_LIFECYCLE_DETAIL WHERE GUID=#GUID#
mapper.insert:
insert into MA_LIFECYCLE_DETAIL (guid, masterfk, DATASEQ, itemname, title,
description,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime) values (#GUID:VARCHAR#, #MASTERFK:VARCHAR#, #DATASEQ#, #ITEMNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
update MA_LIFECYCLE_DETAIL
masterfk = #MASTERFK#, DATASEQ = #DATASEQ#, itemname = #ITEMNAME#, title = #TITLE#, description = #DESCRIPTION#,
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID# where guid = #GUID#
